(10) 5. rāgapeyyālaṃ Vaggo pañcamo
77 Rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya nava dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame nava asubhasaññā maraṇasaññā āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā Ma. anabhiratisaññā. aniccasaññā anicce dukkhasaññā dukkhe anattasaññā pahānasaññā virāgasaññā. Rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime nava dhammā bhāvetabbāti.
78 Rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya nava dhammā bhāvetabbā.
Katame nava paṭhamajjhānaṁ dutiyajjhānaṁ tatiyajjhānaṁ catutthajjhānaṁ ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ saññāvedayitanirodho. Rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime nava dhammā bhāvetabbā.
79 Rāgassa bhikkhave pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya khayāya vayāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya ime nava dhammā bhāvetabbā. Dosassa mohassa
kodhassa upanāhassa makkhassa palāsassa issāya macchariyassa māyāya sātheyyassa thambhassa sārambhassa mānassa atimānassa madassa pamādassa abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya khayāya vayāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya ime nava dhammā bhāvetabbāti.
